items.title: This 1 New Move by Goldman Sachs Could Boost Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Maybe Even XRP
items.description: The famous investment bank Goldman Sachs (NYSE: GS) just did something that crypto investors need to know about.  The bank's action has significant implications for the future prices of Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC), Ethereum (CRYPTO: ETH), and perhaps also XRP (CRYPTO: XRP) in the future, assuming they repeat the move with another digital asset.  Here's what Goldman Sachs did and why it matters.

items.title: Is Goldman Sachs Group Inc. (GS) the Most Undervalued Large Cap Stock to Buy Now?
